Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city building code, in relation to requiring permit holders responsible for sidewalk sheds or scaffolding to repair or replace certain damaged city-owned trees
Items.MatterName: Requiring permit holders responsible for sidewalk sheds or scaffolding to repair or replace certain damaged city-owned trees.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of housing preservation and development to increase tenant relocation services in the event of a vacate order
Items.MatterName: Requiring the department of housing preservation and development to increase tenant relocation services in the event of a vacate order.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to how affordable housing units which subsequently became vacant are rented through the housing portal
Items.MatterName: How affordable housing units which subsequently became vacant are rented through the housing portal.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of housing preservation and development to create an in-person housing portal assistance program
Items.MatterName: Requiring the department of housing preservation and development to create an in-person housing portal assistance program.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York and the New York city building code, in relation to protections for construction workers from extreme heat
Items.MatterName: Protections for construction workers from extreme heat.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to allowing the occupancy of cellars in certain one- and two-family dwellings
Items.MatterName: Allowing the occupancy of cellars in certain one- and two-family dwellings.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, the New York city building code, and the New York city fire code, in relation to shared housing

A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the department of health and mental hygiene posting worker guidance for best practices for protecting workers from extreme weather
Items.MatterName: Department of health and mental hygiene posting worker guidance for best practices for protecting workers from extreme weather.
